Description.Text: The hotel was originally a holiday villa built in the early 19th century and at the end of the 50s was used as an annexe of 'Hotel Iaccarino. In the 60s the house was finally transformed, expanded and adapted to customer needs in those years has hosted the best Neapolitan nobility and bourgeoisie. The 'ancient tradition of hospitality and attentive service ensure maximum relaxation in a welcoming and comfortable environment.Inside of the hotel are fine examples of antique paintings and furniture. The hotel is in the middle of large grounds and has a swimming pool and private parking. Within walking distance is the village centre, with its restaurants (some having Michelin stars and incorporated into the network "slow food"), banks, post office and shops. The Hotel delle Palme is located in a strategic position on the ridge of the Sorrento Peninsula, which offers the possibility of more than Km.70 of hiking trails in the green of the Mediterranean, with breathtaking panoramic views of the two seas of the Gulf of Naples and the Gulf of Salerno and passing between the ancient villages scattered throughout the lubrense territory; Sorrento, Positano, the Amalfi coast, Pompei, Herculaneum and Naples are easily reached by bus, train or private transport. The islands of Capri and Ischia can easily be reached by sea from Sorrento!

The Hotel Delle Palme is situated in the centre of Sant'Agata sui due Golfi, a hamlet in the hills above Sorrento. Sant'Agata sui due Golfi, one of the most famous tourist resorts of Sorrento, is situated at 400m above sea level and enjoys fresh air and mild climate.
The hotel was originally a holiday villa built in the early 19th century

The restaurant offers traditional local specialties and typical dishes of the Mediterranean cuisine. The products of excellent quality, and mostly produced from locally, skillfully prepared by our Chef will delight even the most discerning palates. Our menus, prepared according to the seasonal products, are to meet the various needs of our guests, by the flavors of Mediterranean pasta with fresh local sea food, to the most tender meat in a delicious dessert. All accompanied by a wide selection of local wines. Possibility of customizies the menu for guests with special needs. For those who wish, the hotel offers room service for an additional charge of â‚¬ 5.00. The service is available from 8.00 to 21.00 for drinks, and during restaurant opening hours for meals.
The lobby reflect the Villa Style of the hotel "Classical" and "Confortable".
